issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Error Message For Maximum Key and Value Lengths for Tags Don't Match AWS Behavior

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* Per [AWS compatibility for maximum number of tags allowed per resource|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/Using_Tags.html#tag-restrictions], the [AWS error code 'TagLimitExceeded'|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/api-error-codes.html] should be returned. We return 'InternalFailure': {code} [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-create-tags --tag name11=harold11 vol-6c16fee8 -I AKIOQS8WTUDCCYHAKBYQ -S vgT3kgPZHluMIgU4qyatUQsC7PY1geIhnUDIg4sY euca-create-tags: error (InternalFailure): The maximum number of Tags for a resource has been reached {code} *Signs* * euca-create-tags with --debug {code} [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-describe-volumes -I AKIOQS8WTUDCCYHAKBYQ -S vgT3kgPZHluMIgU4qyatUQsC7PY1geIhnUDIg4sY VOLUME vol-6c16fee8 2 GIRL available 2014-04-22T23:20:25.715Z standard TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name1 harold1 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name10 harold10 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name2 harold2 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name3 harold3 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name4 harold4 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name5 harold5 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name6 harold6 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name7 harold7 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name8 harold8 TAG volume vol-6c16fee8 name9 harold9 [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-create-tags --tag name11=harold11 vol-6c16fee8 -I AKIOQS8WTUDCCYHAKBYQ -S vgT3kgPZHluMIgU4qyatUQsC7PY1geIhnUDIg4sY --debug 2014-04-22 16:24:04,029 DEBUG CreateTags parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'ResourceId': ['vol-6c16fee8'], 'region': None, 'Tag': [{'Value': 'harold11', 'Key': 'name11'}], 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': 'AKIOQS8WTUDCCYHAKBYQ', 'secret_key': } 2014-04-22 16:24:04,032 INFO CreateTags parameters: {'ResourceId.1': fields.summary: TagLimitExceeded Not Returned When Maximum Number of Tags Are Exceeded

comments.body: Verified that correct message is thrown "euca-create-tags: error (TagLimitExceeded): The maximum number of Tags for a resource has been reached."
